title: Which K-pop groups is the most overrated and underrated? - Quora

response.answer_text: I rate them overrated/underrated based on their music, of course. Overrated: Blackpink Okay, I’m not attacking Blackpink or anything, this is just my opinion. I think BP is overrated because of their fans (specifically ‘blonks’ in other words toxic blinks), the bandwagon and YGE. It’s not that they don’t deserve the hype or anything, but they are overhyped by their fans. Personally I don’t like their songs, it’s just not my cup of tea. You can call your favourite group/s kings or queens of kpop, there’s nothing wrong with that, but… I think they need something more to prove. Twice Sorry ONCEs, I just really think Twice is overrated. No kidding. Yes, they worked hard and all but their music is not for everyone. Some of their members are versatile, but their music isn’t. They don’t need concepts and all because they are really talented. I hate to say this but for me their songs are pretty generic. Underrated: Aha, we have a ton but I’ll give three. iKON (I’d like to use the word ‘underappreciated’ rather than underrated) Many of you will probably think ‘they’re not underrated, they have Love Scenario that topped the charts’. No, they are one of the underdogs. I know many people who don’t like their songs (even though it’s really good and meaningful) and doesn’t like their visuals (because they have the thing called ‘YG style’ and ‘YG swag’). They’re not not your typical idol, not the neighborhood idol type either, not the innocent, cutesy idol you are used to (most of the 3rd gen idols tbh) and I think that’s the reason koreans doesn’t like them (Japanese fans are the complete opposite tho) I know many people when you asked them: “Do you know any members of iKON?” Then they will answer Bobby or B.I. and nothing more. They are one of the groups I considered real artists, you know what I mean? They’re from YG, YGE’s well-known for making idols real artists, YGE invests in them not because of their looks but their music. They may not be popular around their country, but I think their music is one the best. EXAMPLES: Airplane - for me this is their real masterpiece. Love Scenario, Killing Me, I’m Okay - three of their best breakup songs. B.i their leader, the main songwriter and also a producer, wrote them. He won an award for that. (p.s iKONICs are one of the laid back and chillest fandom I’ve ever been. Things are just not that good between Inner Circles and iKONICs (from which I am both), but overall we’re good.) INFINITE Oooh, it’s been a long time. I rarely talk about them because I know no one knows them (which is very sad because I really want to talk about them to my friends) and if someone knows about them they’ll just start talking shit. That is one thing I don’t understand. What’s there to hate about INFINITE? I’ve been in to Kpop since 2008 because I grew up with it (I lived with my cousins and they talk about kpop all the time even before I was born, funny but true). I remember watching MAMA 2012 and they really didn’t stand out to me, to be honest, every time there’s a group performing I can’t help but compare them to Big Bang. But in their group, the one who stands out the most for me is Sunggyu He’s my bias and he literally pulled me in their fandom. INFINITE is pretty popular, but I added them here because they’re almost forgotten and their music is underappreciated. I miss them. Day6 When we talk about korean bands, we usually think of CNBLUE or F.T. Island. To be honest, I am not a fan, I listened to some of Day6’s songs and liked Sweet Chaos the most. But I’m adding them to this list because they really are underrated and I think they deserve more. I just want you to know that they are real artists that want to fit in the korean music industry that is full of idols (it’s not a bad thing, alright?)

Underrated:Male: Think A.C.E or ONF had recent comebacks that didn’t do their abilities justice. Their problem is that their songs aren’t that great. ATEEZ has good songs but i think aren’t as popular as they deserve to be imo but ACE ONF and SF9 are some underrated groups that really get little light. Female: Someone said WJSN or Weki Meki, and i think WJSN are actually pretty popular. Weki Meki is a group I can get behind as being underrated, but a group i think many people have forgotten is Berry Good. The company is kinda mismanaging them, which is sad cause they have 3 really good vocalists. Overrated:Male: I would say BTS, but their work ethic is still respectable, despite their music getting formulaic and uninspiring recently, But the group I’d most wanna highlight as overrated is NCT. Their concept is very messy, they have too many members, poor line division because of that (see cherry bomb, although superhuman fixed that), emotionless performances, clear favoritism from the company… idk, i think theyre fantastic dancers, Mark is a good rapper, and taeil needs better vocal songs for his abilities, but the group is such a hit or miss for me, and rarely do they hit. Power of SM i guess. Female: BlackPink and Red Velvet come across as quite stuck up in their success. Not a big fan, but you can tell by their performances. They don’t look like they care about their fans and care about creating good music. They’re a successful product generating profit, but it feels so disconnected.

It is really funny how all answers here are all the same: First of all, no-one is overrated, overrated means being undeserving of your success, and you don't know who really work hard and who doesn't, but I know one thing, no-one will train in a company and take all the pressure if they aren't really passionate about what they do because let's be real no sane person will join this messed up industry if they aren't really passionate, especially the big companies like SM, JYP, Bighit, YG, and CJ E&M, their training is the worst especially SM and YG and once they debut they get alot of attention, yes but alot of hate comes along with attention, these groups suffer as much as the other groups who are from small companies, I will talk about SM since I am the most familiar with them, you think because it's the biggest company out there, that their groups were comfortable and living their lives, SUJU after debuting didn't have money to buy food so Leeteuk took money from Yunho to bring food to the members, EXO only had one kimbap for each member aday for two years until growl became a hit and they were able to have their own money after paying the company their trainee debt so the big companies only invest money in their music videos and albums but the groups are treated like shit, for YG IKON had to compete against Winner to debut, blackpink's debut kept on being delayed for more than a year, and you should see Treasure episode with ODG when they were talking about their trainee days, it was so heartbreaking, JYP and CJ E&M groups are always made out of survival shows and we all know how survival shows are horrible, and for BTS how can anyone say that they are overrated, we all know their story how after all these suffers, you dare to say that they are overrated. For the ones who are underrated, again no-one is really underrated, underrated means being belittled, and Dreamcatcher, the rose, Day6 are the most well known rock based groups and everybody acknowledge their talents if they know them, I bet you have never heard anything bad being said about them all I see are compliments, actually I bet if these groups were the ones who are as popular as BTS, blackpink, Twice, you would call them overrated. So please, BTS, Blackpink, Twice, NCT, Ateez, TXT, etc are not overrated, they are just more popular than your favourites so stop being salty and have a live.

In my opinion, no Kpop is group is overrated. All Kpop groups work hard. They may not have struggled on the same degree compare to other groups, but all of them strive hard in order to give their best in what they do. It actually depends on how you interpret a group as “overrated”. “Overrated” is defined as having a higher opinion about something or someone that is deserved. Therefore, stating that a group is overrated is entirely subjective. Some people argue that Blackpink is an overrated group. Contrary to that statement, I don’t believe that Blackpink is overrated. Instead, they are overhyped by YGE and their fans. This also include people who use them for clout. The members of Blackpink are talented, they wouldn’t have gotten in YG if they’re not talented. However, YGE seems to limit these girls in unleashing their potential. It would be much better if YG focuses more on improving Blackpink’s weak points. Sorry Blinks, but Blackpink are not yet the “Queens of Kpop”. They still have a long way to go in order to achieve that title. Same for BTS and Twice. They’re not overrated, they’re overhyped. These groups deserve the fame they’re getting right now. They’ve worked hard for it. As for the underrated groups, here are some of the groups that have crossed my mind. (I think I’m contradicting my previous statement regarding the interpretation of being overrated.) Let me rephrase that… For me, here are some less-known Kpop groups that you need to check out. Dreamcatcher I’ve recently checked them out. I don’t know much about this group yet, but I really liked their concept and music. They are the first girl group I’ve seen to adopt a dark concept. If you like Kpop songs with hard rock vibes in it, then you should check this group out. They are talented.  Song Title: Chase Me  Song Title: Good Night  Song Title: What The Rose Their songs are great, plus they also produce their own music. What I admire about them the most are the vocalists, they have such angelic voices. You should check them out.  Song title: Sorry  Song title: Baby That will be all for now. I’ll try to add more kpop groups soon.

First of all, I'm not putting some hate or showing my uninterested in any idols.. This is just my unpopular and honest opinion… please no hate okay? Overrated artist? For this I'll likely to go with BTS.. Yeah you heard me right.. It's not that I hate them, but I think that they're too overrated to the point if someone loves kpop will be assuming stanning them.. I mean, they aren't just the only kpop idol though.. There still have NCT, EXO, TWICE, BLACKPINK and IKON..  and now for underrated artist.. Well there will be likely to be many underrated one. I mean, have you ever heard about ATEEZ? REDVELVET? ROCKET PUNCH? No right? If you're asking why did I included red velvet there, here is my answer. They might have known whole world right now but that's is not the point. They barely have any contents in youtube plus their promotions weren't that long. Their company wasn't even treat them right at the moment.. Thanks to all of their fans, they get acknowledged.. Andddd their talents also underrated.. So i think it's is okay to include RV as underrated artist here..  If you don't like my opinion, it's okay then.. Just please don't assuming that I hate them.. Don't be childish okay? And please stop the fanwars👌🏼 have a nice day

Overrated • Itzy  I think Itzy is a pretty overrated group. Not hating, but I don't really like their music much neither do I think there's anything special about them. They're just fine. Not too bad but quite overrated in my opinion. Their music isn't quite something out of the world, but Not Shy was pretty good for a comeback. • LOONA  People may disagree on this with me but I believe that LOONA is also very overrated. Like every third person today is talking about them. I did listen to their music, but I don't think It's something really extraordinary. Underrated • BVNDIT  BVNDIT IS SO SO SO UNDERRATED! People dislike them for no absolute reason! They are always called ugly and how their voices are husky which don't match the cute K-pop concept at all. I just wanna say they have amazing music, and y'all should try listening to at least one song. You will not regret it. • OH MY GIRL  I haven't studied about this group much, but I can definitely say that they're underrated. Their music is just so beautiful in simple words. Their concept is something I really love. It's like so magical and mysterious. I almost feel like as if I'm in another world when I listen to their music! They're really amazing. EVERYTHING WRITTEN ABOVE IS JUST MY OPINION. I DON'T WANT ANYBODY ATTACKING ME. YES YOU CAN DISAGREE BUT PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO BE RESPECTFUL.

I recently discovered Weki Meki and their songs are amazing!! A very underrated girl group. I also think Weki Meki Doyeon deserves more appreciation and fame for her visuals. In terms of overrated, I’d say Blackpink tbh. Their songs never interest me and they’re hyped be to one of the best in everything; but they lack in all departments. They aren’t bad and I can understand why their famous and hyped, but I think with the fame they have their management and the girls should be doing better. Its crazy that Jisoo is the most underrated member, but to me she’s not only improved the most but surpassed Jennie and Rose in terms of visuals, vocally, and stage presence.

Overrated: ATEEZ. I cannot for the life of me understand why so many people like their songs. Pirate King was amazing, but everything since is just not very good. Underrated: Day6. They have some of the best songs in all of K-pop. JYP kinda screws them over with promotion plus they don’t dance like most groups so they’re not as well known, unfortunately.

Most overrated: (since they are soo popular and claim they(korea) are number 1 then blackpink(which I find that fake because they are both on top))  Most underrated: Dreamcatcher  I hardly even see these girls

Underrated: mamamoo exid oh my girl dreamcatcher oneus loona cravity overrated NONE, every group worked hard for where they have reached if u are saying that any group is overrated you are basically discrediting their hard work
